API version {{version}}

The API works over HTTP. All requests return a response with a code 200. The default response to the error code is 200.
API responses are divided into 2 types: errors and response.

Success response [200 OK] 
{
  "response": {
    "success": true
  }
}
Response with errors [200 OK] 
{
    "error": {
        "code": "Error.Code",
        "failure_param": "param_name",
        "msg": "Error description",
        "params": {
            "param_name": "value"
        }
    }
}
